pages.text: $(li)The Frost Walker enchantment can be applied in any kind of Boots.$(br)$(li)This enchantment makes you to freeze the water under you, allowing you to walk over the water.
pages.title: Frost Walker

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level II.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level III of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_frost_walker)Ancient Tome (Frost Walker)$(/l).
